General.Description: Bytecoin is a decentralized cryptocurrency with open source that enables people to participate in the development of the Bytecoin network. The privacy and safety come from using Bytecoin. This is the best solution for those who want to keep their financial privacy. This is a completely independent currency developed separately from Bitcoin and its forks.
General.Features: Here are the list features of the BCN coin: Code and wallet function optimization; 2FA using Google Authenticator; QR-code reader; Monitor the rates by clicking on the header; Direct links from the hash to the block explorer.
General.Technology: Bytecoin (BCN) is the first currency based on CryptoNote technology and reissued in July 2012. BCN protects your privacy with anonymous and non-anonymous transactions, so it deserves to be called the next generation anonymous cryptocurrency.
